## GVTYStake class

Represents a user's GVTY stake and accrued gains.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GVTYStake 
```

## Remarks

Returned by the [getGVTYStake()](./lib-base.readablegivety.getgvtystake.md) function.

The constructor for this class is marked as internal. Third-party code should not call the constructor directly or create subclasses that extend the `GVTYStake` class.

|  [isEmpty](./lib-base.gvtystake.isempty.md) |  | boolean |  |
|  [gusdGain](./lib-base.gvtystake.gusdgain.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | GUSD gain available to withdraw. |
|  [stakedGVTY](./lib-base.gvtystake.stakedgvty.md) |  | [Decimal](./lib-base.decimal.md) | The amount of GVTY that's staked. |
